alert.note: Alert for Glascock; Jefferson; Washington (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 2:12AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Baldwin, Glascock, central Washington and central Jefferson Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 211 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Deepstep, or near Sandersville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Sandersville, Gibson, Davisboro, Tennille, Stapleton, Avera, Mitchell, Deepstep, Edge Hill, Edgehill, Downs, Warthen, Grange, Stapletons Crossroads, Agricola and Hebron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM EDT for central and east central Georgia.
